post.author: Baddcog
post.body:
Sorry, I am posting without seraching, about ready to go to bed and really have no time, but could use help on this one.

There seems to be alot of confusion as to how many polys/edges and verts a collision model for a moveable can have.

And what exactly a 'polygon' in a collision model consists of.

Does anyone have the exact info I'm looking for?
